snippet: Patience and intensity will be crucial if Valencia are to overturn a 2-0 deficit in Thursday's Europa League semi-final, second leg at home to La Liga rivals Sevilla, coach Juan Antonio Pizzi said....

headline.print_headline: Patience Key to Valencia's Comeback Chances, Says Pizzi
headline.main: Patience Key to Valencia's Comeback Chances, Says Pizzi

lead_paragraph: Patience and intensity will be crucial if Valencia are to overturn a 2-0 deficit in Thursday's Europa League semi-final, second leg at home to La Liga rivals Sevilla, coach Juan Antonio Pizzi said.
